name: The camera cannot lie
description:
The Camera Cannot Lie

There was a murder. You must find who killed Alice during her Halloween party. Interrogate up to four suspects in order to reveal the killer's identity. You may, however, have one problem: every suspect is lying about something. It's up to you to uncover the truth and elminiate the killer.

Be careful though: killing an innocent won't look good on you and your career as an inspector. Good luck.
